channel.title: RuneScape Crumble Undead Rewrite
channel.description:
So I'm rewriting the crumble undead spell to automatically kill undead. I also want it to require a special staff, and use a special rune.
Can anyone help me with that?

item.title: RuneScape Crumble Undead Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:2, topic:542099”]-first you need to make sure the staff is able to use normal magic. this is done via the actionhandler and clickingbuttons. you can look up so many guides on chaotic staff set up this should be a breeze…

to make it “auto kill” there are a couple of points i would like to make the obvious way of doing this is to go to

your npchandler and do something simple like

if(spellId == blah) {
c.damage 999;
}

obviously this is just a sample and you will have to do your own homework and have some java knowledge.[/quote]
and take into account if the npc is an undead one or not… lol

if (GET_PLAYER_WEAPON() == CRUMBLE_STAFF && GET_ITEM_COUNT(CRUMBLE_RUNE) > 0 && isUndead(npcID)) DAMAGE = NPC_HEALTH;
An increasing problem in the help forum is that noone ever posts their revision or base. If you were to want more detailed answers, PROVIDE MORE INFORMATION

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Crumble Undead Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

-first you need to make sure the staff is able to use normal magic. this is done via the actionhandler and clickingbuttons. you can look up so many guides on chaotic staff set up this should be a breeze…

to make it “auto kill” there are a couple of points i would like to make the obvious way of doing this is to go to

your npchandler and do something simple like

if(spellId == blah) {
c.damage 999;
}

obviously this is just a sample and you will have to do your own homework and have some java knowledge.
